data.eml:eml: Taxonomic updates in Dolichandra Cham. (Bignonieae, Bignoniaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fonseca, Luiz Henrique M., Cabral, Simone Miranda, Agra, Maria de Fatima, Lohmann, Lucia G. (2015): Taxonomic updates in Dolichandra Cham. (Bignonieae, Bignoniaceae). PhytoKeys 46: 35-43, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.46.8421, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.46.8421
